'''Minecraft: Papercraft Studio''' is an app for {{w|iOS}} developed by [[57Digital]] which was initially released on February 13, 2013. In this app you can create paper figures of Minecraft mobs and characters.

== Purchase and availability ==
Minecraft: Papercraft Studio is available to buy on {{W|App Store}} for $4.99.

The app is available on the following platforms:
* iPhone
* iPad

The app supporting following languages:
* English

== Functional ==
The application allows you to generate templates for printing and assembling paper figures of Minecraft mobs and characters. Templates can be customized in height, armor, and cape. The character skin can be selected from the catalog or found by name.
